snippet.title: Suit for Hire - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Shoot and toss enemies around in this top-down arcade shooter, cause mayhem and fight using your gun-fu and martial arts to reach the best scores possible.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1612420/Suit_for_Hire/

Follow the game's development -
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/thecrimsondev
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/firstcrimson
Website: https://www.suit4hire.com
